content: My grade for PSET 1 dropped from 80% to 40%. Is this normal?
subject: My grade for PSET 1 changed

content: @Nadia Waid you handgraded this one. Can you take a look and let me know if the original grade should stand?
Student came in to ask about it in office hours, their autograder score doesn't even show a 40%, but it says 40% on the grade page
The 40% is because I overrode their score based on manual grading.
